other_tests.findings: Aspiration of the side-branch cystic lesion.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT of Abdomen and Pelvis with and without contrast
other_tests.findings: An 15 x 11 mm hypodense lesion in the tail of the pancreas consistent with IPMN, mild peripancreatic stranding consistent with post-ERCP changes, small bilateral pleural effusions, trace free fluid within the abdomen, and unremarkable findings for many other structures.
